name: dataproduct-mcp
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for discovering data products and requesting access in Data Mesh Manager, and executing queries on the data platform to access business data.

tools.name: dataproduct_search
tools.description: Search data products based on search terms. Only returns active data products.

tools.name: dataproduct_get
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific data product including output ports and access status.

tools.name: dataproduct_request_access
tools.description: Request access to a specific output port of a data product.

tools.name: dataproduct_query
tools.description: Execute SQL queries on data product output ports (requires active access).

DATAMESH_MANAGER_API_KEY.title: Data Mesh Manager API Key
DATAMESH_MANAGER_API_KEY.description: The API Key with User scope
